name: Angel PEREZ, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia, Respondents

parties: Angel PEREZ, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of May, 2012, the “Application for Review or Petition for the Remission of the Record and Remand to the Lower Court and/or Extraordinary Mandamus Relief,” the Application for Appointment of Counsel, and the Application for an Immediate Hearing are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
43 A.3d 1286
Angel PEREZ, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia, Respondents.
No. 22 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 7, 2012.
